text: Forgot to update you guys, so it seems there was a problem with my access, other devs can view the modules normally. Thanks!

Hi <@U02SDDQ3B3N>
I’m not sure if it helps, but it’s worth noting that flex_positioning is deprecated.
Here’s a doc that has more info on the dnd tags
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags/dnd-areas>
Oh thank you! I think I figured out a different way to do it but I really appreciate your help! I am new to the system and will be building out a few sites in HubSpot this year.
